uk.ac.uea.framework.implementation

Class AndroidCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.framework.implementation.AndroidCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Camera

    public class AndroidCamera
extends java.lang.Object
implements Camera
    Created by Jack L. Clements on 24/11/2015. Camera object that implements the Camera interface utilising the Camera2 API, a list of asynch calls. Don't meddle with this code if you can get away with it, the nature of the method calls make it VERY complex.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  AndroidCamera.ImageSaver
      Static nested class, deals with saving a new image from the camera in a seperate thread

      • mCaptureCallback

        private CameraCaptureSession.CaptureCallback mCaptureCallback
        Instance of a capturecallback, making sure that the autofocus cannot be called during lock. Can be used with semaphore, but as no picture data is needed in this app, it is not implemented.
